description: "He gave her a coat of stars, that she now wears like a second skin." In Kayil York's fourth book, 11:11 is a dive into the world of true love, twin flames, and the magic of connection. A full reality of happiness that surrounds two lovers in the thick of life. Her newest collection is a world of the raw, a world of sheer passion, and a world of depth that will give you goosebumps. Immerse yourself into a new universe of the way souls collide into something that's more than love.
author: Kayil York
